promoCards.title: Chance: Bureau Agent
powers: Flip a coin. Heads: Destroy 1 environment card. Tails: Destroy 1 villain ongoing card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card
Destroy a target with 3 or fewer HP.
Flip a coin. Heads: Reduce the next damage dealt to a hero target by 2. Tails: Increase the next damage dealt to a villain target by 2.

openingLines.default: Nothing to see here. It's just hallucinations caused by a gas leak.

cards.title: Chance
powers: Flip a coin. Heads: Draw 1 card. Tails: {Chance} deals 1 target 2 damage of any type.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One player may use a power.
Flip a coin. Heads: One hero gains 2 HP. Tails: One hero deals one villain target 2 damage of any type.

openingLines.default: We've got good odds, let's get 'em!
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.HrnTllCharacter: Stop! You'll tear the universe apart!

cards.title: Vorpal Sword
powers: {Chance} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. If a non-character target is damaged this way, flip 4 coins. If there are at least 4 heads, destroy that target.
cards.body: Increase melee damage dealt by {Chance} by 1.

cards.title: Lucky Penny
cards.body: When this card enters play, you may draw a card or use a power. When you would flip a coin, you may choose the result. If you do, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: A penny? It's my lucky day.

cards.title: Chaos Arc
powers: Flip 2 coins. {Chance} deals 1 target X damage of any type or up to X targets 1 damage of any type each, where X is the number of heads plus 1.

cards.title: Unstable Energy
cards.body: When {Chance} would use a power, you may select a numeral in that power and increase or reduce it by 2. Then, if you did, flip a coin. Tails: Destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: C'mon, just a little... bit... more!

cards.title: Mirror Image
cards.body: You may use an additional power during your power phase.
powers: {Chance} may deal 1 other hero 2 psychic damage. Each hero dealt damage this way may use a power.
cards.flavorText: Yes, that's me, I am the real Heartbeat and{br}not an illusion.

cards.title: Entropic Chains
cards.body: {Chance} deals 1 target 3 projectile damage. Prevent the next damage dealt by that target.
cards.flavorText: These are no mortal bindings.{br}Let's test them on you.

cards.title: Chance Encounter
cards.body: You may play a card, use a power, and draw a card.
cards.flavorText: Guess who I ran into on the street today!

cards.title: Probabilistic Foresight
cards.body: Reveal and replace the top card of each deck. You may play the top card of each deck or discard the top card of each deck.

flavorQuotes.text: So he'll blow up the refinery?
It's the most likely possibility. It depends on what we do now.

cards.title: Obliviate
cards.body: {Chance} deals 1 target 2 infernal damage. Flip a coin. Heads: You may destroy up to as many ongoing or environment cards as the damage dealt. Tails: If a non-character target dealt damage this way has less than 10 HP remaining, destroy it.

cards.title: Eldritch Conduit
cards.body: Select a damage type. Until the end of your next turn, {Chance} is immune to that damage type and increase damage of that type dealt by {Chance} by 1. {Chance} deals up to 3 targets 1 damage of that type each.
cards.flavorText: So much power. Where does it come from?

cards.title: Controlled Chaos
cards.body: Draw up to 3 cards. For each card drawn this way, flip a coin. Heads: {Chance} deals 1 target 1 energy damage. Tails: Discard a card and one other player draws a card.
cards.flavorText: Whenever a butterfly flaps its wings,{br}I see an opportunity.

cards.title: Chaos Bolt
cards.body: {Chance} deals 1 non-hero target 3 damage of any type. If damage is dealt this way, flip a coin. Heads: {Chance} deals that target 3 additional damage of any type. Tails: {Chance} deals each other non-hero target 1 damage of any type.
cards.flavorText: Nothing like a giant blast of psychic{br}electricity to clear out a nest of spiders, eh?

cards.title: Lucky Find
cards.body: Flip a coin. Heads: Search your deck for an Ongoing or Equipment card and put it into your hand, then shuffle your deck. Tails: Reveal cards from your deck until an Ongoing or Equipment card is revealed. Put that card into play, then shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck.
cards.flavorText: It's been a while since I found a clue.{br}Odds are... Yep, there it is!

cards.title: Wild Rush
cards.body: You may use a power now. {Chance} deals 1 target 2 melee damage.

cards.title: Chaotic Nimbus
cards.body: {Chance} may deal 1 target 1 damage of any type. Flip a coin. Heads: repeat the entire game text of this card, but you may not choose the same damage type again.
cards.flavorText: Fire! Poison! Rubber ducks!{br}... Rubber ducks?
